categories: Category:Star Wars: Rebel Assault II: The Hidden Empire voice actors

nodes.text: Roy Conrad was an actor and voice actor, more commonly known among the LucasArts fandom as the voice of Ben in the game Full Throttle.
Conrad also voiced Rebel pilot Ace Merrick in Star Wars: Rebel Assault II: The Hidden Empire.
Conrad was most known for his deep and heavy voice, and died of lung cancer in 2002.
